bug.author: andrewcz
bug.description: is there a multivariate numerical time series example in tensorflow. Many thanks, Andrew

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/girving>@girving</denchmark-link> if no body is working on that issue , i can start working on it

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mbaddar1>@mbaddar1</denchmark-link> : Very cool! <denchmark-link:https://github.com/martinwicke>@martinwicke</denchmark-link> : Do you think this should go in core or the upcoming model zoo?
Hi guys! Apologies but is this inferring that somebody will work on the time series problem? Many thanks guys, Andrew
and is there a link to zoo? Cheers, Andrew

Zoo: shortly. Nobody is working on a time series example as far as I know. On Mon, Jan 25, 2016 at 17:22 andrewcz <denchmark-link:mailto:notifications@github.com>notifications@github.com</denchmark-link> wrote:
and is there a link to zoo? Cheers, Andrew ‚Äî Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub #309 (comment) .

<denchmark-link:https://m.reddit.com/r/MachineLearning/comments/3sok8k/tensorflow_basic_rnn_example_with_variable_length/>https://m.reddit.com/r/MachineLearning/comments/3sok8k/tensorflow_basic_rnn_example_with_variable_length/</denchmark-link>
Thought i would post this here. somebody might turn it into a tutorial. Best, Andrew
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/allenlavoie>@allenlavoie</denchmark-link> how far are we with time series?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/martinwicke>@martinwicke</denchmark-link> We're looking to open source in Q2. I was actually going to ask you (or someone else who works on Estimators) to look at the API soon.
Automatically closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will reopen the issue. Thanks!
New information: probably going to be the (very) beginning of Q3 rather than the end of Q2. Definitely in contrib for 1.3. Re-opening because this is still relevant.

We have some <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/timeseries>time series Estimators in contrib</denchmark-link> . Feel free to take a look and open specific bugs/feature requests.
